pseudocode_questions.question:
Integer funn(Integer p, Integer q)
if(p + q < 10)
Return 1 + funn(p + 1, q + 1)
Else
Return 2
End if

Integer compute(Integer n)
if(n == 0)
Return 1
Else
Return n * compute(n-1)
End if

Integer mystery(Integer x)
if(x <=1)
Return 1
Else
Return x + mystery(x-1)
End if

Integer sumDigits(Integer num)
if(num == 0)
Return 0
Else
Return (num % 10) + sumDigits(num / 10)
End if

Integer power(Integer base, Integer exp)
if(exp == 0)
Return 1
Else
Return base * power(base, exp - 1)
End if

Integer fib(Integer n)
if(n <= 1)
Return n
Else
Return fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
End if

Integer countDown(Integer n)
if(n == 0)
Return 0
Else
Return 1 + countDown(n - 1)
End if

Integer gcd(Integer a, Integer b)
if(b == 0)
Return a
Else
Return gcd(b, a % b)
End if

Integer factorial(Integer n)
if(n <= 1)
Return 1
Else
Return n * factorial(n - 1)
End if

Integer countEvenDigits(Integer num)
if(num == 0)
Return 0
Else if((num % 10) % 2 == 0)
Return 1 + countEvenDigits(num / 10)
Else
Return countEvenDigits(num / 10)
End if

Integer sumArray(Integer arr[], Integer n)
Set sum = 0
For i = 0 to n-1
sum = sum + arr[i]
End For
Return sum

Integer maxElement(Integer arr[], Integer n)
Set max = arr[0]
For i = 1 to n-1
If arr[i] > max Then
max = arr[i]
End If
End For
Return max

Boolean isPrime(Integer num)
If num <= 1 Then
Return false
End If
For i = 2 to sqrt(num)
If num % i == 0 Then
Return false
End If
End For
Return true

Integer fibonacci(Integer n)
If n == 0 Then
Return 0
Else If n == 1 Then
Return 1
Else
Return fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)
End If

Integer reverseNumber(Integer num)
Set rev = 0
While num > 0
rev = rev * 10 + num % 10
num = num / 10
End While
Return rev

Integer gcdIterative(Integer a, Integer b)
While b != 0
temp = b
b = a % b
a = temp
End While
Return a

Boolean isPalindrome(String str)
Set i = 0, j = length(str) - 1
While i < j
If str[i] != str[j] Then
Return false
End If
i = i + 1
j = j - 1
End While
Return true

Integer countVowels(String str)
Set count = 0
For each char c in str
If c in ['a','e','i','o','u'] Then
count = count + 1
End If
End For
Return count

Integer countWords(String str)
Set count = 1
For i = 0 to length(str) - 1
If str[i] == ' ' Then
count = count + 1
End If
End For
Return count

Boolean isAnagram(String s1, String s2)
If length(s1) != length(s2) Then
Return false
End If
Sort s1 and s2
Return s1 == s2

Integer findMin(Integer arr[], Integer n)
Set min = arr[0]
For i = 1 to n-1
If arr[i] < min Then
min = arr[i]
End If
End For
Return min

Integer sumOfSquares(Integer n)
Set sum = 0
For i = 1 to n
sum = sum + i * i
End For
Return sum

Integer factorialIterative(Integer n)
Set fact = 1
For i = 1 to n
fact = fact * i
End For
Return fact

Reverse an array
For i = 0 to n/2
Swap(arr[i], arr[n-1-i])
End For

Check if array is sorted ascending
For i = 0 to n-2
If arr[i] > arr[i+1] Then
Return false
End If
End For
Return true

Integer binarySearch(Integer arr[], Integer n, Integer key)
Set low = 0
Set high = n-1
While low <= high
Set mid = (low + high)/2
If arr[mid] == key Then
Return mid
Else If arr[mid] < key Then
low = mid + 1
Else
high = mid - 1
End If
End While
Return -1

Count the number of vowels and consonants in a string
Set vowels = 0
Set consonants = 0
For each char in string
If char is vowel Then vowels++ Else consonants++
End For

Check if number is Armstrong
Set sum = 0
Set temp = number
While temp > 0
Set digit = temp % 10
sum = sum + digit^3
Set temp = temp / 10
End While
If sum == number Then Return true Else false

Calculate Fibonacci(n) using iteration
Set a = 0, b = 1
For i = 2 to n
Set c = a + b
Set a = b
Set b = c
End For
Return b

Check if year is leap year
If (year % 400 == 0) OR (year % 4 == 0 AND year % 100 != 0) Then Return true Else false
